sections.title: Overview

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: R1 is not applicable as there are no diagrams present in the overview section, which focuses only on textual information about the AGK gene.
R2 is also not applicable because there are no diagrams discussed in the overview section where expansions to the standardised formatting would be considered.

sections.meta_notes: The section provides a comprehensive textual summary of the AGK gene's function and significance without the inclusion of diagrams.
